pr_title: Do not allow tutors to override their own assessments if there is a complaint

timeline.message: do not fetch submissions with results which have complains

Remove transactional & refactor getSubmissionsByTutorForExercise
For all exercise types to filter out results with complaints
Also delete old method from ResultRepository and move to SubmissionRepository

Update TextSubmissionService.java

Remove transactional
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/hide-your-assessments-with-complains
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/hide-your-assessments-with-complains
allow results with complaints to be listed in the tutor dashboard
Do not allow tutors to override results if there is a complaint for their assessment
Merge branch 'develop' into bugfix/hide-your-assessments-with-complains
Lock the input fields in case the user cannot override
lock general input elements if readOnly mode
lock input elements for text submissions
hide text submissions inputs if read only
do not allow tutor to override modeling submissions if  there is a complaint
do not allow overriding if assessment has complaint
Merge branch 'bugfix/hide-your-assessments-with-complains' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into bugfix/hide-your-assessments-with-complains

decouple canOverride from readonly attributes, as complain evaluationg tutors should not override the result but rather evaluate the complaint. However
readonly should only apply for the original tutor, when there is a complaint for his assessment
canOverride follows the old rules (instructor | assessment on time | is Assesor) AND it must not have a complaint
update edge case header text display
Let the tutor know if the complaint has already been handled.
It should never be read only for instructors
